short-expl.textTransformation: After the processing of the control symbols you will get your results.
short-expl.decoder: A decoder will order the recognized letters according to their probability and will assign each letter based on its most likely probability.
short-expl.network:
The spectrogram will be processed by a neural network. It computes probabilities. To be more precise, how well the recording at a given time matches to a letter from the training data.

The training data consists of hundreds of hours of voice recordings.
short-expl.spectrogram: The sound is converted into a spectrogram. It captures the composition of your pitch (frequency spectrum), and how this composition will change over time.
short-expl.waveform: The soundwaves of your voice are recorded as waveform.
